General.Name: Zhejiang Dahua Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Dahua Technology Co., Ltd. operates in the intelligent Internet of Things industry worldwide. The company offers network, high definition composite video interface (HDCVI), PTZ, and thermal cameras; network and HDCVI recorders; video intercoms, including accessories and emergency phone terminals, as well as IP, Wi-Fi, 2-wire, 4-wire, and analog products; and access control products, such as controllers, modules, turnstiles, accessories, AI, and time attendance solutions. It also provides alarms; traffic enforcement, traffic signal control, entrance and exit, parking, mobile products/solutions, MPT, and related software and accessories; transmission solutions comprising PoE, ePoE, access, aggregation, and core switches, as well as related accessories and platforms, wireless devices, and cyber security products; display and control solutions, including decoders, keyboards, monitors, LCD video walls, LCD digital signage, and LED displays; and video conferencing solutions. In addition, the company offers face recognition, vehicle analysis, event detection, and structuring servers; security screening; IP storage products; drones; memory cards and internal SSDs, USB flash drives, and external storage; and camera accessories, power, cabling, and audio solutions, as well as detectors and software solutions. It serves transportation, building, retail, banking and finance, critical infrastructure, traffic, culture, education, and healthcare industries. The company was incorporated in 2002 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.
